# Blinding Sickness
## Overview
**Type:** disease, ingested

**Save:** Fortitude DC 16

**Onset:** 1d3 days

**Frequency:** 1/day

**Effect:** 1d4 Str damage, if more than 2 Str damage, target must make an additional Fort save or be permanently [[Blinded|blinded]];

**Cure:** 2 consecutive saves
